title: 'Cubs of the Caliphate': rehabilitating I.S. child fighters
text:
'Cubs of the Caliphate': rehabilitating I.S. child fighters 2:36pm GMT - 01:46 
Naif Jardo Qassim says he wasn't emotionally prepared to listen to the stories of boys and girls as their only therapist at a center for former children conscripted by Islamic State. Matthew Larotonda reports.   
Naif Jardo Qassim says he wasn't emotionally prepared to listen to the stories of boys and girls as their only therapist at a center for former children conscripted by Islamic State. Matthew Larotonda reports.  //reut.rs/2Ic6jvJ
